title: Source-based integrated writing design education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic academic writing and data analysis skills
context.additional_context: Systematic education program for job seekers and graduate students to improve comprehensive academic and practical writing skills.

learning_goals: Learners can select key information from diverse sources and evaluate its relevance
Learners can enhance outlining skills by systematizing selected information into logical structures
Learners can compose coherent thematic texts by connecting organized information
Learners can iteratively improve writing processes through peer feedback while engaging in formative assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
